verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said ( Jacob Returns to Bethel) אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm Then God אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ Jacob, ק֛וּם <WH6965> qūm “ Arise, עֲלֵ֥ה <WH5927> ‘ă·lêh go up בֵֽית־ <WH1008> ḇêṯ- to אֵ֖ל <WH1008> ’êl Bethel, וְשֶׁב־ <WH3427> wə·šeḇ- and settle שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> šām there. וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> wa·‘ă·śêh- Build שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> šām there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> miz·bê·aḥ an altar לָאֵל֙ <WH410> lā·’êl to the God הַנִּרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> han·nir·’eh who appeared אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> ’ê·le·ḵā to בְּבָרְחֲךָ֔ <WH1272> bə·ḇå̄·rə·ḥă·ḵå̄ you when you fled מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> mip·pə·nê from עֵשָׂ֥ו <WH6215> ‘ê·śāw Esau. ” אָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> ’ā·ḥî·ḵā your brother

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer told יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ So Jacob אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> bê·ṯōw his household וְאֶ֖ל <WH413> wə·’el ... כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer who עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> ‘im·mōw were with him, הָסִ֜רוּ <WH5493> hā·si·rū “ Get rid of אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <WH5236> han·nê·ḵār the foreign אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that בְּתֹכְכֶ֔ם <WH8432> bə·ṯō·ḵə·ḵem are among you. וְהִֽטַּהֲר֔וּ <WH2891> wə·hiṭ·ṭa·hă·rū Purify yourselves וְהַחֲלִ֖יפוּ <WH2498> wə·ha·ḥă·lî·p̄ū and change שִׂמְלֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8071> śim·lō·ṯê·ḵem your garments.

וְנָק֥וּמָה <WH6965> wə·nā·qū·māh Then let us arise וְנַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> wə·na·‘ă·leh and go בֵּֽית־ <WH1008> bêṯ- to אֵ֑ל <WH1008> ’êl Bethel. וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> wə·’e·‘ĕ·śeh- I will build שָּׁ֣ם <WH8033> šām there מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <WH4196> miz·bê·aḥ an altar לָאֵ֞ל <WH410> lā·’êl to God, הָעֹנֶ֤ה <WH6030> hā·‘ō·neh who answered אֹתִי֙ <WH853> ’ō·ṯî me בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> bə·yō·wm in my day צָֽרָתִ֔י <WH6869> ṣā·rā·ṯî of distress. וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> way·hî He has been עִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> ‘im·mā·ḏî with me בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> bad·de·reḵ wherever אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - הָלָֽכְתִּי׃ <WH1980> hā·lā·ḵə·tî I have gone. ”

וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> way·yit·tə·nū So they gave אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- ... יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ Jacob אֵ֣ת <WH853> ’êṯ - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê gods הַנֵּכָר֙ <WH5236> han·nê·ḵār foreign אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer their בְּיָדָ֔ם <WH3027> bə·yā·ḏām ... וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - הַנְּזָמִ֖ים <WH5141> han·nə·zā·mîm and [all their] earrings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> ’ă·šer -, בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH241> bə·’ā·zə·nê·hem - וַיִּטְמֹ֤ן <WH2934> way·yiṭ·mōn buried אֹתָם֙ <WH853> ’ō·ṯām them יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ and Jacob תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ under הָאֵלָ֖ה <WH424> hā·’ê·lāh the oak ( Or terebinth or great tree) אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer - עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- near שְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH7927> šə·ḵem Shechem.

וַיִּסָּ֑עוּ <WH5265> way·yis·sā·‘ū As they set out, וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> way·hî fell חִתַּ֣ת <WH2847> ḥit·taṯ a terror אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm from God עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- over הֶֽעָרִים֙ <WH5892> he·‘ā·rîm cities, אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ’ă·šer - סְבִיבֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5439> sə·ḇî·ḇō·ṯê·hem the surrounding וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō so that they did not רָֽדְפ֔וּ <WH7291> rā·ḏə·p̄ū pursue אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> ’a·ḥă·rê ... בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> bə·nê sons. יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ Jacob’s

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> way·yā·ḇō arrived יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ So Jacob ל֗וּזָה <WH3870> lū·zāh in Luz אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> ’ă·šer - בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> bə·’e·reṣ in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> kə·na·‘an of Canaan. הִ֖וא <WH1931> hî (that is, בֵּֽית־ <WH1008> bêṯ- ... אֵ֑ל <WH1008> ’êl Bethel) ה֖וּא <WH1931> hū ... וְכָל־ <WH3605> wə·ḵāl and everyone הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām ... אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> ‘im·mōw with him

וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> way·yi·ḇen Jacob built שָׁם֙ <WH8033> šām There מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> miz·bê·aḥ an altar, וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> way·yiq·rā and he called לַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> lam·mā·qō·wm that place אֵ֖ל <WH416> ’êl vvv בֵּֽית־ <WH416> bêṯ- vvv אֵ֑ל <WH416> ’êl El-bethel, ( El-bethel means God of Bethel.) כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî because שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> šām it was there נִגְל֤וּ <WH1540> niḡ·lū had revealed Himself אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> ’ê·lāw to [Jacob] הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> hā·’ĕ·lō·hîm that God בְּבָרְח֖וֹ <WH1272> bə·ḇā·rə·ḥōw as he fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip·pə·nê from אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> ’ā·ḥîw his brother.

וַתָּ֤מָת <WH4191> wat·tā·māṯ died דְּבֹרָה֙ <WH1683> də·ḇō·rāh Now Deborah, מֵינֶ֣קֶת <WH3243> mê·ne·qeṯ nurse, רִבְקָ֔ה <WH7259> riḇ·qāh Rebekah’s וַתִּקָּבֵ֛ר <WH6912> wat·tiq·qā·ḇêr and was buried מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> mit·ta·ḥaṯ under לְבֵֽית־ <WH1008> lə·ḇêṯ- vvv אֵ֖ל <WH1008> ’êl Bethel. תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ below הָֽאַלּ֑וֹן <WH437> hā·’al·lō·wn the oak ( Or great tree) וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā So [Jacob] named שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> šə·mōw [it] אַלּ֥וֹן <WH439> ’al·lō·wn vvv בָּכֽוּת׃פ <WH439> bā·ḵūṯ Allon-bachuth. ( Allon-bacuth means oak of weeping.)

וַיֵּרָ֨א <WH7200> way·yê·rā appeared אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to יַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ [him] ע֔וֹד <WH5750> ‘ō·wḏ again בְּבֹא֖וֹ <WH935> bə·ḇō·’ōw After [Jacob] had returned מִפַּדַּ֣ן <WH6307> mip·pad·dan from אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> ’ă·rām Paddan-aram, ( That is, northwest Mesopotamia; also in verse 26) וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ <WH1288> way·ḇā·reḵ and blessed אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853> ’ō·ṯōw him.

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> way·yō·mer- said ל֥וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) to him, אֱלֹהִ֖ים 430 N-mp ( ’ĕ·lō·hîm) And God שִׁמְךָ֣ 8034 N-msc│2ms ( šim·ḵā) “ [Though] your name יַעֲקֹ֑ב 3290 N-proper-ms ( ya·‘ă·qōḇ) is Jacob, לֹֽא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) you will no יִקָּרֵא֩ 7121 V-Nifal-Imperf-3ms ( yiq·qā·rê) be called שִׁמְךָ֙ 8034 N-msc│2ms ( šim·ḵå̄) ... ע֜וֹד 5750 Adv ( ‘ō·wḏ) longer יַעֲקֹ֗ב 3290 N-proper-ms ( ya·‘ă·qōḇ) Jacob. כִּ֤י 3588 Conj ( kî) Instead אִם־ 518 Conj ( ’im-) ..., יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) Israel. ” יִהְיֶ֣ה 1961 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yih·yeh) will be שְׁמֶ֔ךָ 8034 N-msc│2ms ( šə·me·ḵā) your name וַיִּקְרָ֥א 7121 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·yiq·rā) So [God] named אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - שְׁמ֖וֹ 8034 N-msc│3ms ( šə·mōw) him יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ 3478 N-proper-ms ( yiś·rā·’êl) Israel.

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> way·yō·mer told ל֨וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) him, אֱלֹהִ֜ים 430 N-mp ( ’ĕ·lō·hîm) And God אֲנִ֨י 589 Pro-1cs ( ’ă·nî) “ I אֵ֤ל 410 N-ms ( ’êl) am God שַׁדַּי֙ 7706 N-proper-ms ( šad·day) Almighty. פְּרֵ֣ה 6509 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( pə·rêh) Be fruitful וּרְבֵ֔ה 7235 Conj-w│V-Qal-Imp-ms ( ū·rə·ḇêh) and multiply. גּ֛וֹי 1471 N-ms ( gō·w) A nation — וּקְהַ֥ל 6951 Conj-w│N-msc ( ū·qə·hal) even a company גּוֹיִ֖ם 1471 N-mp ( gō·w·yim) of nations — יִהְיֶ֣ה 1961 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yih·yeh) shall come מִמֶּ֑ךָּ 4480 Prep│2ms ( mim·me·kā) from you, וּמְלָכִ֖ים 4428 Conj-w│N-mp ( ū·mə·lā·ḵîm) and kings מֵחֲלָצֶ֥יךָ 2504 Prep-m│N-mdc│2ms ( mê·ḥă·lā·ṣe·ḵā) from you. יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ 3318 V-Qal-Imperf-3mp ( yê·ṣê·’ū) shall descend

וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ The land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that נָתַ֛תִּי <WH5414> nā·ṯat·tî I will give לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> lə·’aḇ·rā·hām to Abraham וּלְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> ū·lə·yiṣ·ḥāq and Isaac לְךָ֣ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) to you, אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה 5414 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs│3fse ( ’et·tə·nen·nāh) I gave וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֥ 2233 Conj-w, Prep-l│N-msc│2ms ( ū·lə·zar·‘ă·ḵā) to your descendants אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ 310 Prep│2ms ( ’a·ḥă·re·ḵā) after you. ” אֶתֵּ֥ן 5414 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’et·tên) and I will give אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - הָאָֽרֶץ׃ 776 Art│N-fs ( hā·’ā·reṣ) this land

וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> way·ya·‘al went up מֵעָלָ֖יו <WH5921> mê·‘ā·lāw from אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm Then God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> bam·mā·qō·wm the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- where דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib·ber He had spoken אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> ’it·tōw with him.

וַיַּצֵּ֨ב <WH5324> way·yaṣ·ṣêḇ set up יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ So Jacob מַצֵּבָ֗ה <WH4676> maṣ·ṣê·ḇāh a pillar בַּמָּק֛וֹם <WH4725> bam·mā·qō·wm in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- where דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib·ber [God] had spoken אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> ’it·tōw with him — מַצֶּ֣בֶת <WH4678> maṣ·ṣe·ḇeṯ marker — אָ֑בֶן <WH68> ’ā·ḇen a stone וַיַּסֵּ֤ךְ <WH5258> way·yas·sêḵ and he poured out עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> ‘ā·le·hā on it נֶ֔סֶךְ <WH5262> ne·seḵ a drink offering וַיִּצֹ֥ק <WH3332> way·yi·ṣōq and anointed it עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> ‘ā·le·hā ... שָֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> šā·men with oil.

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā called יַעֲקֹ֜ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ Jacob אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> šêm ... הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> ham·mā·qō·wm the place אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> ’ă·šer where דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> dib·ber had spoken אִתּ֥וֹ <WH854> ’it·tōw with him שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> šām vvv אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God בֵּֽית־ <WH1008> bêṯ- vvv אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> ’êl Bethel. ( Bethel means house of God.)

( Benjamin Born, Rachel Dies) וַיִּסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> way·yis·‘ū Later, they set out מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1008> mib·bêṯ from אֵ֔ל <WH1008> ’êl Bethel, וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> way·hî- and while they were ע֥וֹד <WH5750> ‘ō·wḏ still כִּבְרַת־ <WH3530> kiḇ·raṯ- some distance הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ ... לָב֣וֹא <WH935> lā·ḇō·w ... אֶפְרָ֑תָה <WH672> ’ep̄·rā·ṯāh from Ephrath, וַתֵּ֥לֶד <WH3205> wat·tê·leḏ began to give birth, רָחֵ֖ל <WH7354> rā·ḥêl Rachel וַתְּקַ֥שׁ <WH7185> wat·tə·qaš was difficult. בְּלִדְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3205> bə·liḏ·tāh and her labor

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> way·hî During בְהַקְשֹׁתָ֖הּ <WH7185> ḇə·haq·šō·ṯāh her severe בְּלִדְתָּ֑הּ <WH3205> bə·liḏ·tāh labor, וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> wat·tō·mer said לָ֤הּ Prep│3fs ( lāh) to her, הַמְיַלֶּ֙דֶת֙ 3205 Art│V-Piel-Prtcpl-fs ( ham·yal·le·ḏeṯ) the midwife אַל־ 408 Adv ( ’al-) “ Do not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י 3372 V-Qal-Imperf-2fs ( tî·rə·’î) be afraid, כִּֽי־ 3588 Conj ( kî-) for גַם־ 1571 Conj ( ḡam-) another זֶ֥ה 2088 Pro-ms ( zeh) are having לָ֖ךְ Prep│2fs ( lāḵ) you בֵּֽן׃ 1121 N-ms ( bên) son. ”

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> way·hî And בְּצֵ֤את <WH3318> bə·ṣêṯ with her last נַפְשָׁהּ֙ <WH5315> nap̄·šāh breath — כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî for מֵ֔תָה <WH4191> mê·ṯāh she was dying — וַתִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> wat·tiq·rā she named שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> šə·mōw ... בֶּן־ <WH1126> ben- vvv him אוֹנִ֑י <WH1126> ’ō·w·nî Ben-oni.
